DOC.detailed_description: The necessity cryopreserve human oocytes successfully , goal achieve term pregnancy rate equivalent obtain fresh oocyte urgent . Cryopreservation oocytes desirable : 1 ) would allow infertility patient store excess oocyte instead embryos , eliminate ethical religious concern accompany embryo storage ; 2 ) permit storage donor oocytes egg bank , analogous exist sperm bank . This option would allow cryopreserved oocyte quarantine screen infectious disease complete , would also avoid donor-recipient synchronization difficulty ; 3 ) help cancer patient preserve fertility face sterilization due chemotherapy radiation . Oocyte cryopreservation therefore gain popularity option infertility treatment well fertility preservation . This pilot study evaluate outcome oocyte vitrification use Cryotop method woman undergo IVF , simultaneously evaluate embryo derive vitrified fresh oocyte come stimulated cycle . The primary outcome measure track tabulated oocyte survival , fertilization cleavage rate , subsequent embryo development , compare vitrified fresh oocyte . DOC.criteria: 1 . Females 21 37 year age . 2 . Normal serum follicle stimulate hormone ( FSH ) concentration < 10 mIU/ml estradiol ( E2 ) concentration < 70 pg/ml obtain day # 2 3 menstrual cycle . 3 . BMI < 35 . 4 . No physical gynecological abnormality ( include major uterine surgery ) constitute medical contraindication embryo transfer pregnancy include know significant genetic disorder 5 . Nonsmoker least 3 month prior study enrollment . 6 . Normal antral follicle count ( total â‰¥ 10 ) . 1 . Greater 1 previous miscarriage . 2 . More 1 previous fail IVF attempt . 3 . Previous poor response ovarian stimulation ( peak E2 level < 1,000 pg/ml < 4 oocyte retrieve ) . 4 . Presence untreated hydrosalpinx . 5 . Stage III IV endometriosis . 6 . Intent preimplantation genetic diagnosis ( PGD ) embryos 7 . Unwillingness freeze inseminate eligible oocyte embryos . 8 . Male partner require surgical sperm retrieval ( MESA TESA ) .
